title: How to Record and Save Google Translate Voice on Android

steps.title: Download Easy Voice Recorder.
steps.content: Download Easy Voice Recorder. You can find this in the Google Play Store. [1] X Research source Easy Voice Recorder is recommended as it can record while running in the background of your device. If you want to use another recording app, make sure it has this function.

steps.title: Open Google Translate .
steps.content: Open Google Translate . You can find this app on your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Enter your translation.
steps.content: Enter your translation. Use the drop-down menus to enter the languages you need translated. Tap the text field to enter your text. You can tap the camera icon to translate a picture or the microphone icon to record speech to translate.

steps.title: Open Easy Voice Recorder.
steps.content: Open Easy Voice Recorder. You can find this on your home screen or app drawer. You may be asked to allow permission to access your microphone. Tap Ok, Got It! .

steps.title: Tap the red record button.
steps.content: Tap the red record button. This is in the bottom middle of your screen. Sound picked up through your microphone is recorded.

steps.title: Return to Google Translate.
steps.content: Return to Google Translate . This app should still be running in the background.

steps.title: Tap the speaker icon next to the translated phrase.
steps.content: Tap the speaker icon next to the translated phrase. Google Translate will speak the translated phrase. Make sure your phone volume is on and at an audible level.

steps.title: When you're done recording, tap the stop icon.
steps.content: When you're done recording, tap the stop icon. This is located in the widget notification center along the top of your screen. You can access this button by swiping down from the top of your screen.

steps.title: Listen to the recording.
steps.content: Listen to the recording. Return to the Easy Voice Recorder app. You'll see your recording listed. Tap Listen to play the recording. To share the recording, tap ⋮ and select a share option. You can also record Google Translate on your computer .

steps.title: Enter your translation in Google Translate.
steps.content: Enter your translation in Google Translate. Use the drop-down menus to enter the languages you need translated. Tap the text field to enter your text. You can tap the camera icon to translate a picture or the microphone icon to record speech to translate.

steps.title: Tap the star icon.
steps.content: Tap the star icon. This is in the upper right of the blue tile of your translated phrase. The phrase will be saved to your phrasebook within Google Translate. If you want to view your saved phrases, tap ☰ and tap Phrasebook .
